resources.string: You have quite a lovely article. It would be nice if you got to read a few characters from it! I might type a few more pieces of dummy text into here to see how much I can get in there.
No connection or articles, but here\'s a cat!
An error occured. Here\'s a cat to make you feel better.
No news, but here is that cat again!
Nothing could load, but here is a cat.
